column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This is pizza this the best in Chicago. If you are looking for traditional Chicago pizza
column2: this is your place. The pizza is consistent and always taste great. One thing you need to know when ordering deep dish pizza in Chicago is it takes at least 45 minutes to cook usually. Make sure you order apps if your hungry. This place is casual
column3: great for families and can hold big parties.
